detailed_goals: Prototype basic movement and player input.
Research movement techniques used in similar games.
Set up the basic project structure and version control.
Create the player character class and integrate the input system.
Implement basic player movement (walk, run, jump).
Prototype camera controls and follow behavior.
Implement basic collision to prevent the player from walking through walls.
Initial sketches and mood boards for the game world.
Focus on establishing the overall art style and color palette.
Simple blockout models for the environment to test player movement and scale.
Concept art for the player character, focusing on silhouette and basic features.
Initial exploration of character animations (walk cycle, idle pose).
Create a small, playable area with basic environmental assets (walls, floors, simple props).
The focus should be on functionality and readability, not high fidelity.
